message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $700000 for it.
I understand that $1000000 might be a bit steep, but I believe the product's value is worth more than $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000.
